tool_description: Calculates storage bin capacity metrics including volume utilization, weight limits, and optimal item counts based on bin dimensions and constraints.

bin_id.description: Identifier of the bin to calculate capacity for

item_length_cm.description: Length of items to be stored in centimeters

item_width_cm.description: Width of items to be stored in centimeters

item_height_cm.description: Height of items to be stored in centimeters

item_weight_kg.description: Weight of individual items in kilograms

error_messages: Invalid bin_id: Bin must exist in the system with defined dimensions.
Invalid item dimensions: item_length_cm, item_width_cm, item_height_cm must be positive numbers if provided.
Invalid item_weight_kg: Must be a positive number if specified.
Items too large: Item dimensions exceed bin capacity.
usage: Provide bin_id and optionally item dimensions and weight to calculate how many items can fit. Without item dimensions, returns general bin capacity metrics.

max_item_count.description: Maximum number of specified items that can fit
